Test Steps: Add product to cart > Verify cart contents
Expected Result: Product is added to the cart and cart contents updated
Cart should update the quantity of the product

Test Steps: Remove product from cart > Verify cart contents
Expected Result: Product is removed from the cart successfully

Test Steps: Click on checkout button > Check if checkout page opens
Expected Result: Checkout page opens with correct cart details

Test Steps: Add multiple products > Verify total price
Expected Result: Cart total price is calculated correctly
Cart page adjusts properly on mobile devices

Test Steps: Enter invalid payment details > Try to checkout
Expected Result: Error message displayed for invalid payment details

Test Steps: Open product page > Measure load time
Apply product filter > Verify displayed products
Expected Result: Only products matching the filter criteria are displayed
